array.string: I am a node and so is the label up here. We sit on top of a scene; which is our world.
That on the right is a portal for the next Level. Tap to move me there.
Let's create an action so I can move freely
Ok, somehow better, Although I look like a freaking ghost.
I have legs, let's use them.
Nice; threasures! Actually those are just other nodes.
They have a physic body with properties that describe them
Also they are set as dynamic, which means they interact with each other
The scene itself has a physic body and a body gravity
That will effect all the objects in different ways based on their characteristics
What would it be a demo withput cats.
Amaizing beasts; they fly pretty well, you know? And they bounce as well!
Enough with gravity for now. What about some piro!
We can create fires using particle emitters
a pathfinding algorithm should help me get over it
